claim:
They are easy to comprehend when compared with traditional, text-based formats, as less cognitive load is required to process visually-descriptive information.50 Many stakeholders, both professional and community members, can have little time to read the vast amount of published literature in their field, specialty or area of interest.51 52 A well designed infographic overcomes both these challenges.STEP tool
To determine the appropriate communication methods to use to promote the knowledge translation requires an assessment of the complexity of information to be communicated, balanced against the level of interaction with stakeholders or audience (figure 1).
